body_html: Actually, this has an easy fix, put "input_images", "input_labels" block into "with tf.device("/cpu:0"):" block. The problem was that constant nodes were placed on GPU, but the ops that come after it are only supported on CPU, hence the data transfers

body: Actually, this has an easy fix, put "input_images", "input_labels" block into "with tf.device("/cpu:0"):" block. The problem was that constant nodes were placed on GPU, but the ops that come after it are only supported on CPU, hence the data transfers
